channel.title: UTXMP Bug Reports + Troubleshooting
channel.description: Report bugs and other UTXMP issues here for the devs to see.

item.title: AHHHHH! Help Needed
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vitamin-Carrot)
item.dc:creator: Vitamin-Carrot
item.content:encoded:
UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2005-11-23_16.22]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: AuthenticAMD PentiumPro-class processor @ 2005 MHz with 1023MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 (8198)

Failed to find object 'Class XMPUI.XMPServerLoading'

History: UObject::SafeLoadError <- UObject::StaticLoadClass <- LoadingScreen <- UGameEngine::LoadMap <- LocalMapURL <- UGameEngine:rowse <- ClientTravel <- UGameEngine::Tick <- Level Untitled <- UpdateWorld <- MainLoop <- FMallocWindows::Free <-...

AHHHHH! Help Needed

item.title: demoplay bug?
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnarkft)
item.dc:creator: gnarkft
item.content:encoded:
I was recording some matches tonight but when I wanted to watch them (and eventually record them with fraps) it crashes after while, always with the following error:

Code:
UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2004-11-11_10.48]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 3223 MHz with 510MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9800 PRO (6497)

XMPPlayer XMP-GARDEN.XMPPlayer (Function XMP.XMPPlayer.Reload:0000) Infinite script recursion (250 calls) detected

History:...
demoplay bug?

item.title: Players energy full after leaving vehicle.
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnarkft)
item.dc:creator: gnarkft
item.content:encoded: I don't know if it's mentioned before (due to lack of a todo list (hint hint)). But after leaving a vehicle a player has full energy.

item.title: Weird bug I get
item.author: invalid@example.com (Roadkill92)
item.dc:creator: Roadkill92
item.content:encoded: I was playing xmp when Inoticed the stragest thing all my allies/ enemys held their guns on the side???!!! so the gun was lying flat on it's side sorta in their arms if there's a way to fix it could you please relpy because it's very odd

item.title: The error I get...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Roadkill92)
item.dc:creator: Roadkill92
item.content:encoded:
Well basically when I start up your mod it says this

Runtime Error!

Program: C:\Game\UT2004\System\Ut2004.exe

This a[[lication has requested the runtime to terminate it in an unusual way.
Please contact the application's support team for more information.

Pelase help me, I really want to use your mod but I get this

If it helps I have editors choice edition and the latest patch

And I have Evilengine's unreal 2 skaarj models and unreal 2 soldiers

item.title: Not seeing many servers? Here's the fix
item.author: invalid@example.com (PRG)
item.dc:creator: PRG
item.content:encoded: You should be seeing @40 or more server on the server browser. IF you're only seeing @5-20 servers: Click on the Filters button in the server browser and uncheck the default filter checkbox. Click on OK then click on Refresh. You should have alot more servers visible now.

item.title: Vehicle boost not reloading without someone in it.
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnarkft)
item.dc:creator: gnarkft
item.content:encoded:
I don't know if there will ever be feedback or if there will ever be a patch, but I am still hoping it so I keep on posting here.

The Vehicles don't reload their boost energy when noone is in the vehicle. I think it was introduced after some ppl exploited the fullenergy bug when they went out of the vehicle and immidiately went back in. But this also isn't right imo.

item.title: pistol bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnarkft)
item.dc:creator: gnarkft
item.content:encoded:
When you shoot your pistol and you hold in your button, move a bit, and then release it. It makes the sound and hole in the wall at the place you are looking at when you relase the button instead of where you shoot.

BLeP I can't explain it, maybe someone who has a clue I am saying can say it in other words

item.title: UTXMP Crashes at map start
item.author: invalid@example.com (KillaGangsta)
item.dc:creator: KillaGangsta
item.content:encoded:
I went into my instant action for beta 2 and hit the play button it crashed immediately. Here is the message i got:


UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2005-02-15_17.02]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: AuthenticAMD PentiumPro-class processor @ 1797 MHz with 511MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9600 SERIES (6553)

Failed to find object 'Class XMPUI.XMPServerLoading'

History: UObject::SafeLoadError <- UObject::StaticLoadClass <- LoadingScreen <- UGameEngine::LoadMap <- LocalMapURL <-...

UTXMP Crashes at map start

item.title: Artifact + vehicle bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (gnarkft)
item.dc:creator: gnarkft
item.content:encoded: I noticed a couple of times that when an artifact carier entered the vehicle and drove off, that the artifact was still in place where the carrier entered the vehicle. As soon as he got out of the vehicle the arti was back at the carrier.

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 2603 MHz with 511MB RAM
Video: RADEON 9200 SERIES (6467)

XMPTechFBlue XMP-SunsetBeach.XMPTechFBlue (Function XGame.xPawn.PlayDying:0000) Infinite script recursion (250 calls) detected

History: FFrame::Serialize <- UObject:rocessEvent <- (XMPTechFBlue XMP-SunsetBeach.XMPTechFBlue, Function XMP.XMPPawn.Destroyed) <- ULevel:estroyActor <- (XMPTechFBlue...

General Protection Fault...

item.title: UTXMP shortcut wont start ut2004
item.author: invalid@example.com (kgboyer)
item.dc:creator: kgboyer
item.content:encoded: I ran the beta2 patch .exe file that says it contains all files necessary. It created a folder in my UT2004 directory but no UTXMP mod is listed when I look inside the game under community> user mods. The shortcut will not launch the game too. Am I missing a file somehow?

item.title: Look what i found...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Da Spadger)
item.dc:creator: Da Spadger
item.content:encoded:
Look what i found... (Aka, Spadgies own bug reporting thread)

After playing the new beta version for 6 hours straight, i feel all fuzzy and warm inside. It's still a beta though and betas has bugs.


Here they are, bugs that i found while playing.

• The sound from the deploy points are excessivly loud.
• Every weapon with the exception of the rocket launcher has twice as big crosshairs than they're supposed too.
• Sometimes the Raptor turret look like it's firing, but it...

Look what i found...

item.title: The Respawn Bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (Captain Kewl)
item.dc:creator: Captain Kewl
item.content:encoded: Did this happen in beta 1?

item.title: Beta 2 kick out
item.author: invalid@example.com (=OSS*Pendamonium=)
item.dc:creator: =OSS*Pendamonium=
item.content:encoded:
Hey all...long time viewer/player...first time poster.

Listen. Been out of the loop for a while so forgive if this has been covered. I did look for a thread on this but didn't see anything.

I loaded up Beta 2 last night just to see how she worked. I found only a few maps (just read the fix on that one) but decided to just play in a few maps anyway. wanted to see how it looked and ran.

First off....DAMN GOOD JOB!!!! Looks great. Here's the kicker...and I mean that litterally. I was...

Beta 2 kick out

item.title: UTXMPT Version mismatch!
item.author: invalid@example.com (The Punisher)
item.dc:creator: The Punisher
item.content:encoded: i'm having a Version mismatch on the file "UTXMPT". can you fix this please?

item.title: The Bugs I Found...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Stoneblind)
item.dc:creator: Stoneblind
item.content:encoded:
I would like to get straight to the point; check out the list of bugs I found after playing in the BBF server for 5 hours straight tonight.

1. The infamous "cannot respawn" bug is probably among the most popular; we have found a way to work around this by press F4 and rejoining or switching teams. This can be incredibly discouraging from the newcomers, and annoying for the veterans and avid players.

2. The second most infamous bug is probably the "weird weapon switching" bug, where the...

The Bugs I Found...

item.title: Players Must Be Ready
item.author: invalid@example.com (CopperJohn)
item.dc:creator: CopperJohn
item.content:encoded:
FMI, I appreciate all the work you have done on the mod... It is definitely close to scrimmable.

When you get a chance, any possibility of getting the "Players Must Be Ready" (everyone has to click ready before the game starts)? I enabled it on the server but didn't seem to work correctly.

Had a friendly scrim earlier tonight with [_X_], and that would have made things a bit less confusing, and more relaxing
